mapper.sql: id, medicineCode, medicineName, firm, spec, batch, number, minPackageUnit, productionTime,effectiveTime, pinYin,beid
mapper.select:
SELECT count(id) FROM ( select
from bas_anaes_medicine_storage where 1 = 1
and (medicineName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{filter.value}),'%') or pinYin LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filter.value},'%'))
and beid = #{filter.value}
AND ${filter.field} LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{filter.value}),'%')
group by medicineName,firm,spec ) x
mapper.insert: insert into bas_anaes_medicine_storage (id, medicineCode, medicineName, firm, spec, batch, number, minPackageUnit, effectiveTime, productionTime, pinYin,beid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{medicineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minPackageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update bas_anaes_medicine_storage
medicineCode = #{medicineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicineName = #{medicineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
firm = #{firm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spec = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
batch = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
minPackageUnit = #{minPackageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
effectiveTime = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
productionTime = #{productionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pinYin = #{pinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bas_anaes_medicine_storage set medicineCode = #{medicineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicineName = #{medicineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firm = #{firm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spec = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, minPackageUnit = #{minPackageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, effectiveTime = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, productionTime = #{productionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pinYin = #{pinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
